p: Concerning flaviviruses, anatomopathological studies in DENV-infected patients with arboviral-induced myositis indicate perivascular mononuclear infiltrates [ 38] and fibrosis [ 39]. Of note, concerning DENV-induced myocarditis, inflammatory markers such as monocyte chemoattractant protein-1 (MCP-1) could be found in myocardial endothelial cells, cardiac interstitial cells, and myocardial myoblasts, and DENV antigens could be detected in cardiomyocytes, myocardial interstitial cells, and endothelial cells [ 59].
